plot: Non and Indigo use mind control to make the citizens of National City their army, so Kara must find a way to save her friends.

Non activates Myriad which turns all humans in National City to mindless zombies under his control. Supergirl is all alone and discover two people who are not affected. She awaits her cousin to come help but even he is affected. So she needs to decide whether or not to do something drastic.—rcs0411@yahoo.com
